thread.title: Speculators cut US dollar longs to smallest in more than a year -CFTC, | Reuters
thread.title_full: Speculators cut US dollar longs to smallest in more than a year -CFTC, Reuters | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Speculators cut US dollar longs to smallest in more than a year -CFTC, | Reuters
text:
Sept 4 Speculators further cut back bullish bets on the U.S. dollar in the latest week to their smallest in more than a year, according to Reuters calculations and data from the Commodity Futures Trading Commission released on Friday.
The value of the dollar's net long position fell to $21.61 billion in the week ended Sept. 1, from $23.99 billion the previous week. (Reporting by Gertrude Chavez-Dreyfuss ; Editing by Chris Reese )
